1: She dreamt of becoming a writer but never put pen to paper.
2: John would often talk about starting his own business, yet he never took the first step to create a plan.
3: The guitar collected dust in the corner, despite his fascination with music.
4: Although he kept a gym membership, he seldom used it, preferring to lounge at home.
5: She had a list of books to read but always chose to watch television instead.
6: He downloaded several language-learning apps but never opened any of them.
7: The garden was overgrown with weeds, as he never took the initiative to tend to it.
8: Despite her claims of wanting to travel the world, her passport remained unused in a drawer.
9: He bought expensive running shoes but never went out for a jog.
10: She pinned countless recipes on Pinterest but continued to order takeout every evening.
11: He often spoke about writing a novel, yet his notebook was filled with blank pages.
12: Although she wanted to learn to paint, her canvas remained white and untouched.
13: The sewing machine stayed boxed up in the corner; she never found the time to start her fashion projects.
14: She signed up for an online course but never managed to complete a single module.
15: Every year he vowed to quit smoking, but the unopened packs continued to pile up in the drawer.
16: He admired the fit athletes on social media but never committed to a fitness regimen himself.
17: She bought a piano but its keys never felt her fingers press down in practice.
18: Although he planned numerous projects for home improvement, the tools stayed untouched in the garage.
19: The camera he bought for a photography hobby remained unused; its battery still in the packaging.
20: She always spoke about finding a new job with better opportunities, yet never updated her resume or applied anywhere.
